alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Blaine (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 8:09AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alfalfa, northwestern Blaine, west central Garfield and eastern Major Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 808 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Longdale, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enid, Fairview, Helena, Lahoma, Ringwood, Cleo Springs, Longdale, Goltry, Ames, Meno, Carrier, Canton Lake, Orienta, Isabella, Homestead and Southard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
